# One spectrum

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Libraries

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

## Read in the datasets

```{r}
hmdb_predicted_msms_peak <- read.csv("data/hmdb_predicted_msms_peak.csv")
```

## Plot one spectrum

### Make the plot

```{r}
spectrum <- hmdb_predicted_msms_peak %>%
  filter(accession == "HMDB0000002")

ggplot(spectrum, aes(x = mz, y = peak)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~ group)
```

### Number of rows

```{r}
nrow(spectrum)
```
